1: וַיְהִ֧י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>had</n> לִֽיהוֹשָׁפָ֛ט <sup>3092 </sup> <n>Now Jehoshaphat</n> עֹ֥שֶׁר <sup>6239 </sup> <n>had riches</n> וְכָב֖וֹד <sup>3519 </sup> <n>and honour</n> לָרֹ֑ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>in abundance</n> וַיִּתְחַתֵּ֖ן <sup>2859 </sup> <n>and joined affinity</n> לְאַחְאָֽב׃ <sup>256 </sup> <n>with Ahab</n>
2: וַיֵּרֶד֩ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>he went down</n> לְקֵ֨ץ <sup>7093 </sup> <n>And after</n> שָׁנִ֤ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>[certain] years</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> אַחְאָב֙ <sup>256 </sup> <n>to Ahab</n> לְשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>to Samaria</n> וַיִּֽזְבַּֽח־ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>killed</n> ל֨וֹ אַחְאָ֜ב <sup>256 </sup> <n>And Ahab</n> צֹ֤אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>sheep</n> וּבָקָר֙ <sup>1241 </sup> <n>and oxen</n> לָרֹ֔ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>for him in abundance</n> וְלָעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and for the people</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> עִמּ֑וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> וַיְסִיתֵ֕הוּ <sup>5496 </sup> <n>that [he had] with him and persuaded</n> לַעֲל֖וֹת <sup>5927 </sup> <n>him to go up</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> רָמ֥וֹת <sup>7433 </sup> <n>Ramoth-gilead</n> גִּלְעָֽד׃ <sup>1568 </sup> <n>Gilead</n>
3: וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אַחְאָ֣ב <sup>256 </sup> <n>And Ahab</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהֽוֹשָׁפָט֙ <sup>3092 </sup> <n>unto Jehoshaphat</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> הֲתֵלֵ֥ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>go</n> עִמִּ֖י <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> רָמֹ֣ת <sup>7433 </sup> <n>Ramoth-gilead</n> גִּלְעָ֑ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>Gilead</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> ל֗וֹ כָּמ֤וֹנִי <sup>3644 </sup> <n>according to</n> כָמ֙וֹךָ֙ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>you</n> וּכְעַמְּךָ֣ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>him I [am] as thou [art] and my people</n> עַמִּ֔י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>as thy people</n> וְעִמְּךָ֖ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>in</n> בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <sup>4421 </sup> <n>and [we will be] with thee in the war</n>
4: וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <sup>3092 </sup> <n>And Jehoshaphat</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>unto the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> דְּרָשׁ־ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>Enquire</n> נָ֥א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>Please</n> כַיּ֖וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>to day</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דְּבַ֥ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>I pray thee at the word</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n>
5: וַיִּקְבֹּ֨ץ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>gathered together</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>Therefore the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנְּבִאִים֮ <sup>5030 </sup> <n>of prophets</n> אַרְבַּ֣ע <sup>702 </sup> <n>four</n> מֵא֣וֹת <sup>3967 </sup> <n>hundred</n> אִישׁ֒ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> הֲנֵלֵ֞ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>go</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>against</n> רָמֹ֥ת <sup>7433 </sup> <n>Ramoth-gilead</n> גִּלְעָ֛ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>Gilead</n> לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>to battle</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>or</n> אֶחְדָּ֑ל <sup>2308 </sup> <n>or shall I forbear</n> וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>? And they said</n> עֲלֵ֔ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>Go up</n> וְיִתֵּ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>will deliver</n> הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>for God</n> בְּיַ֥ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>hand</n> הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>[it] into the king's</n>
6: וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְה֣וֹשָׁפָ֔ט <sup>3092 </sup> <n>But Jehoshaphat</n> הַאֵ֨ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>is there</n> פֹּ֥ה <sup>6311 </sup> <n>here</n> נָבִ֛יא <sup>5030 </sup> <n>[Is there] not here a prophet</n> לַיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> ע֑וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>yet</n> וְנִדְרְשָׁ֖ה <sup>1875 </sup> <n>besides that we might enquire</n> מֵאֹתֽוֹ׃ <sup>853 </sup>
7: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל ׀ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֶֽל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוֹשָׁפָ֡ט <sup>3092 </sup> <n>unto Jehoshaphat</n> ע֣וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>is yet</n> אִישׁ־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> אֶחָ֡ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>[There is] yet one</n> לִדְרוֹשׁ֩ <sup>1875 </sup> <n>by whom we may enquire</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֨ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> מֵֽאֹת֜וֹ <sup>853 </sup> וַאֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> שְׂנֵאתִ֗יהוּ <sup>8130 </sup> <n>but I hate</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵ֠ינֶנּוּ <sup>369 </sup> <n>never</n> מִתְנַבֵּ֨א <sup>5012 </sup> <n>him for he never prophesied</n> עָלַ֤י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>concerning</n> לְטוֹבָה֙ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>good</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>but</n> יָמָ֣יו <sup>3117 </sup> <n>unto me but always</n> לְרָעָ֔ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> ה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>He</n> מִיכָ֣יְהוּ <sup>4321 </sup> <n>the same [is] Micaiah</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יִמְלָ֑א <sup>3229 </sup> <n>of Imla</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְה֣וֹשָׁפָ֔ט <sup>3092 </sup> <n>And Jehoshaphat</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> יֹאמַ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>say</n> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>Let not the king</n> כֵּֽן׃ <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n>
8: וַיִּקְרָא֙ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>called</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> סָרִ֖יס <sup>5631 </sup> <n>[of his] officers</n> אֶחָ֑ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>for one</n> וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> מַהֵ֖ר <sup>4116 </sup> <n>Fetch quickly</n> [מִיכָהוּ כ] (מִיכָ֥יְהוּ <sup>4318 </sup> <n>Micah</n> ק) בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> יִמְלָֽא׃ <sup>3229 </sup> <n>of Imla</n>
9: וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וִֽיהוֹשָׁפָ֣ט <sup>3092 </sup> <n>and Jehoshaphat</n> מֶֽלֶךְ־ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>king</n> יְהוּדָ֡ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> יוֹשְׁבִים֩ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>sat</n> אִ֨ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>either</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> כִּסְא֜וֹ <sup>3678 </sup> <n>of them on his throne</n> מְלֻבָּשִׁ֤ים <sup>3847 </sup> <n>clothed</n> בְּגָדִים֙ <sup>899 </sup> <n>in [their] robes</n> וְיֹשְׁבִ֣ים <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and they sat</n> בְּגֹ֔רֶן <sup>1637 </sup> <n>in a void place</n> פֶּ֖תַח <sup>6607 </sup> <n>at the entering in</n> שַׁ֣עַר <sup>8179 </sup> <n>of the gate</n> שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>of Samaria</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הַ֨נְּבִיאִ֔ים <sup>5030 </sup> <n>and all the prophets</n> מִֽתְנַבְּאִ֖ים <sup>5012 </sup> <n>prophesied</n> לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n>
10: וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>had made</n> ל֛וֹ צִדְקִיָּ֥הוּ <sup>6667 </sup> <n>And Zedekiah</n> בֶֽן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>the son</n> כְּנַעֲנָ֖ה <sup>3668 </sup> <n>of Chenaanah</n> קַרְנֵ֣י <sup>7161 </sup> <n>him horns</n> בַרְזֶ֑ל <sup>1270 </sup> <n>of iron</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> כֹּֽה־ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> בְּאֵ֛לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> תְּנַגַּ֥ח <sup>5055 </sup> <n>With these thou shalt push</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲרָ֖ם <sup>758 </sup> <n>Syria</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> כַּלּוֹתָֽם׃ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>until they be consumed</n>
11: וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> הַ֨נְּבִאִ֔ים <sup>5030 </sup> <n>And all the prophets</n> נִבְּאִ֥ים <sup>5012 </sup> <n>prophesied</n> כֵּ֖ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>thus</n> לֵאמֹ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>so saying</n> עֲלֵ֞ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>Go up</n> רָמֹ֤ת <sup>7433 </sup> <n>to Ramoth-gilead</n> גִּלְעָד֙ <sup>1568 </sup> <n>Gilead</n> וְהַצְלַ֔ח <sup>6743 </sup> <n>and prosper</n> וְנָתַ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>shall deliver</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> בְּיַ֥ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>[it] into the hand</n> הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of the king</n>
12: וְהַמַּלְאָ֞ךְ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>And the messenger</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> הָלַ֣ךְ ׀ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>that went</n> לִקְרֹ֣א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>to call</n> לְמִיכָ֗יְהוּ <sup>4321 </sup> <n>Micaiah</n> דִּבֶּ֤ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>spake</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>to him saying</n> הִנֵּ֞ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> דִּבְרֵ֧י <sup>1697 </sup> <n>Behold the words</n> הַנְּבִאִ֛ים <sup>5030 </sup> <n>of the prophets</n> פֶּֽה־ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>assent</n> אֶחָ֥ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>with one</n> ט֖וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[declare] good</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>to the king</n> וִֽיהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> נָ֧א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>please</n> דְבָרְךָ֛ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>let thy word</n> כְּאַחַ֥ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>therefore I pray thee be like one</n> מֵהֶ֖ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>of them</n> וְדִבַּ֥רְתָּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>of theirs and speak</n> טּֽוֹב׃ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>thou good</n>
13: וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> מִיכָ֑יְהוּ <sup>4321 </sup> <n>And Micaiah</n> חַי־ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>liveth</n> יְהוָ֕ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[As] the LORD</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> יֹאמַ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saith</n> אֱלֹהַ֖י <sup>430 </sup> <n>even what my God</n> אֹת֥וֹ <sup>853 </sup> אֲדַבֵּֽר׃ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>that will I speak</n>
14: וַיָּבֹא֮ <sup>935 </sup> <n>And when he was come</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמֶּלֶךְ֒ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>to the king</n> וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> אֵלָ֗יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> מִיכָה֙ <sup>4318 </sup> <n>unto him Micaiah</n> הֲנֵלֵ֞ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>go</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> רָמֹ֥ת <sup>7433 </sup> <n>Ramoth-gilead</n> גִּלְעָ֛ד <sup>1568 </sup> <n>Gilead</n> לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>to battle</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>or</n> אֶחְדָּ֑ל <sup>2308 </sup> <n>or shall I forbear</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>? And he said</n> עֲל֣וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>Go ye up</n> וְהַצְלִ֔יחוּ <sup>6743 </sup> <n>and prosper</n> וְיִנָּתְנ֖וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and they shall be delivered</n> בְּיֶדְכֶֽם׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>into your hand</n>
15: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>then</n> הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>And the king</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> כַּמֶּ֥ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>how long</n> פְעָמִ֖ים <sup>6471 </sup> <n>to him How many times</n> אֲנִ֣י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> מַשְׁבִּיעֶ֑ךָ <sup>7650 </sup> <n>shall I adjure</n> אֲ֠שֶׁר <sup>834 </sup> <n>to me</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nothing</n> תְדַבֵּ֥ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>thee that thou say</n> אֵלַ֛י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> רַק־ <sup>7535 </sup> <n>but</n> אֱמֶ֖ת <sup>571 </sup> <n>nothing but the truth</n> בְּשֵׁ֥ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>to me in the name</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Jehovah</n>
16: וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then he said</n> רָאִ֤יתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>I did see</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>all Israel</n> נְפוֹצִ֣ים <sup>6327 </sup> <n>scattered</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הֶֽהָרִ֔ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>upon the mountains</n> כַּצֹּ֕אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>as sheep</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>have</n> לָהֶ֖ן רֹעֶ֑ה <sup>7462 </sup> <n>that have no shepherd</n> וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have no</n> אֲדֹנִ֣ים <sup>113 </sup> <n>These have no master</n> לָאֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>These</n> יָשׁ֥וּבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>let them return</n> אִישׁ־ <sup>376 </sup> <n>[therefore] every man</n> לְבֵית֖וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>to his house</n> בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <sup>7965 </sup> <n>in peace</n>

30: וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>Now the king</n> אֲרָ֡ם <sup>758 </sup> <n>of Syria</n> צִוָּה֩ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>had commanded</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שָׂרֵ֨י <sup>8269 </sup> <n>the captains</n> הָרֶ֤כֶב <sup>7393 </sup> <n>of the chariots</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> לוֹ֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>that [were] with him saying</n> לֹ֚א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּלָּ֣חֲמ֔וּ <sup>3898 </sup> <n>Fight</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> הַקָּטֹ֖ן <sup>6996 </sup> <n>ye not with small</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>or</n> הַגָּד֑וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>or great</n> כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִֽם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> מֶ֥לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>save only with the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <sup>905 </sup> <n>alone</n>
31: וַיְהִ֡י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִּרְאוֹת֩ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> שָׂרֵ֨י <sup>8269 </sup> <n>And it came to pass when the captains</n> הָרֶ֜כֶב <sup>7393 </sup> <n>of the chariots</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוֹשָׁפָ֗ט <sup>3092 </sup> <n>Jehoshaphat</n> וְהֵ֤מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>they</n> אָֽמְרוּ֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>that they said</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>It [is] the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> ה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and they</n> וַיָּסֹ֥בּוּ <sup>5437 </sup> <n>Therefore they compassed about</n> עָלָ֖יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> לְהִלָּחֵ֑ם <sup>3898 </sup> <n>him to fight</n> וַיִּזְעַ֤ק <sup>2199 </sup> <n>cried out</n> יְהֽוֹשָׁפָט֙ <sup>3092 </sup> <n>but Jehoshaphat</n> וַֽיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> עֲזָר֔וֹ <sup>5826 </sup> <n>helped</n> וַיְסִיתֵ֥ם <sup>5496 </sup> <n>moved</n> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>him and God</n> מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n>
32: וַיְהִ֗י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> כִּרְאוֹת֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>perceived</n> שָׂרֵ֣י <sup>8269 </sup> <n>For it came to pass that when the captains</n> הָרֶ֔כֶב <sup>7393 </sup> <n>of the chariots</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> הָיָ֖ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>that it was not the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>they turned back again</n> מֵאַחֲרָֽיו׃ <sup>310 </sup> <n>from pursuing</n>
33: וְאִ֗ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> מָשַׁ֤ךְ <sup>4900 </sup> <n>And a [certain] man drew</n> בַּקֶּ֙שֶׁת֙ <sup>7198 </sup> <n>a bow</n> לְתֻמּ֔וֹ <sup>8537 </sup> <n>at a venture</n> וַיַּךְ֙ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and smote</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> בֵּ֥ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>in</n> הַדְּבָקִ֖ים <sup>1694 </sup> <n>between the joints</n> וּבֵ֣ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>among</n> הַשִּׁרְיָ֑ן <sup>8302 </sup> <n>of the harness</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>therefore he said</n> לָֽרַכָּ֗ב <sup>7395 </sup> <n>to his chariot</n> הֲפֹ֧ךְ <sup>2015 </sup> <n>Turn</n> [יָדֶיךָ כ] (יָדְךָ֛ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>able</n> ק) וְהוֹצֵאתַ֥נִי <sup>3318 </sup> <n>that thou mayest carry me out</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>out</n> הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>of the host</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הָחֳלֵֽיתִי׃ <sup>2470 </sup> <n>for I am wounded</n>
34: וַתַּ֤עַל <sup>5927 </sup> <n>increased</n> הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <sup>4421 </sup> <n>And the battle</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>that day</n> הַה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>howbeit the king</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> הָיָ֨ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> מַעֲמִ֧יד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>stayed [himself] up</n> בַּמֶּרְכָּבָ֛ה <sup>4818 </sup> <n>in [his] chariot</n> נֹ֥כַח <sup>5227 </sup> <n>against</n> אֲרָ֖ם <sup>758 </sup> <n>the Syrians</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>until</n> הָעָ֑רֶב <sup>6153 </sup> <n>until the even</n> וַיָּ֕מָת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>he died</n> לְעֵ֖ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>and about the time</n> בּ֥וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>going down</n> הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>of the sun</n>
